0011100111001001 0000110001111100 1 -> sum: 0100011001000110, cout: 0
0100011111111010 0011001001011110 1 -> sum: 0111101001011001, cout: 0
1010011000001010 1111010010000110 0 -> sum: 1001101010010000, cout: 1

0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0

0111111111111111 1000000000000001 1 -> sum: 0000000000000001, cout: 1
